introText: BITS Hyderabad Consulting Group values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. By using our platform, you agree to these terms which outline how we collect, use, protect, and manage your data.
headerSubtitle: Learning Dashboard - Developed by BITS Hyderabad Consulting Group

sections.title: Information We Collect
content: We only collect minimal personal information through secure Google OAuth authentication:
bullets: Your Full Name (from your Google account)

note.text: Personal information and sensitive identifiers are never collected or stored.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
content: We use your information solely to:
bullets: Authenticate and log you into the platform securely via Supabase
Personalize your dashboard experience with your name and profile image
Track your course progress, XP, and quiz submissions
Associate your activity (like submissions and course enrollment) with your account

note.text: We do not send promotional emails, nor do we sell, share, or transfer your data to third parties.

sections.title: Data Protection
bullets: All user data is stored securely using industry-standard practices
Access to personal information is strictly limited to authorized platform administrators
We do not collect any passwords â€” authentication is fully handled by Google OAuth via Supabase

sections.title: Your Rights
content: You have full control over your data:
bullets: You can delete your account and associated data at any time
You can request a copy of the data we store about you via our support team

sections.title: Account Deletion
content: To request account deletion and permanent removal of your information from our system, please contact us using the email below.
